page.title: 02Mr Robinson ( A farmer )
page.content: My name is{William Robinson}and I am 85 years old.I have spent all my life in farming.I am the oldest man who has been born and still resides in {Stanbury}.I have been working as a farmer for 68 years.I wake up at 6 o'clock in the morning and,before my breakfast,I milk the cows.I have thirty six cows.I milk them twice daily and feed them three times daily. The times are before breakfast.Then at nine thirty in the morning they have a second feed.I feed them again at four thirty in the evening.When I have had my tea I go to milk the cows.I work full time and I have three assistants who help me.Farming is very hard work,especially during harvesting.When harvesting is over,the amount of work eases off. In winter I keep all the animals inside.I grow some turnips and oats
